summary: I'll be updating this page with a variety of Skyrim mod videos as and when I release them. I've already covered quite a few different types, and intend to release new videos fairly regularly to help share some of the great work going on amongst the modding community.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://files.enjin.com.s3.amazonaws.com/324946/module_gallery/original/1225776.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][color=#dd9323]About this video series ..[/color][/b]

This is my series of videos entirely focused on Skyrim mods. As you'd expect, I cover all sorts of mods in an attempt to share their awesomeness (or lack thereof) with the Skyrim community. Links to all the mods being featured are in the description on Youtube, along with other related mods and credits. Please always check the main mod page for dependencies and other requirements!

[center][u]This page contains the latest video in the series, with a full list of all videos in the series below it.
A number of the videos will be available for download on the 'files' tab (some in a lower resolution to save space on the Nexus).
Also, all videos in the series are viewable in 1080p HD on the 'videos' tab.[/u][/center]

This is the first mod series I've ever done for a game, despite playing extensively modded versions of Dragon Age Origins, Fallout 3, Fallout New Vegas, Company of Heroes, Oblivion, Neverwinter Nights, and a whole host of other titles. I hope you enjoy the videos, and find a cool mod to play!


[b][color=#dd9323]Latest video in the series (more below it) ..[/color][/b]

[center][youtube]RpMbSFrtlO0[/youtube][/center]


[b][color=#dd9323]Full list of the mod videos in the series ..[/color][/b]

- [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RpMbSFrtlO0]Followers Focus #3[/url] (Walks-Among-Clouds, Yuri the Elder Trainer, Lunari Followers Michelle and Arwyn, Killer Rabbit, and Hordes of Things)
- [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xgDbPv42EZE]Helgen Reborn[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FXyWpkhUozU]Mash-up #3[/url] (Fea Rana Follower, Druids Den, The Reserve II, Diamond Armor Smithing, and Monster Mod)
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=po5FyA6-zvo]Followers Focus #2[/url] (Akhaziir Khajiit scout, Lilium, Andromeda, Bony the skeleton, and Army of One)
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zgvzOFuuLdk]Wyrmstooth[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckSYR3tdcHs]Mash-up #2[/url] (Millwater Retreat, Eevee the Magical Fox Companion, Eryniel Elf Reborn, Imperial Mage Armor, the Dread Knight Weapon Set, and the Dread Crossbow)
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ikzPINse0YI]Mash-up #1[/url] (Lilith's Slayer - part of Lilith's Tools, Dogs of Skyrim, Elven Follower Aranya, Ebony Mage Armor, and The Bow of the Dark One)
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=76ZlCQSPo3g]Sanctum of the Fallen[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lPEp8WxTl3c]Blaze of Eventide[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ySsqZUYTJFE]Followers Focus #1[/url] (Girls of Skyrim, Kaiden Thrace, Vilja, Chicken Companion, Dovahbear, and Slave Pack Riekling Porter)
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URGgKOX3KEs]Flyable Dragon Races 3[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8fOYecaZBQ8]Agent of Righteous Might[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PbP5gVvy_Ok]Cerwiden - SMART Healer[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7kctf3imwnU]Convenient Horses[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ATzgovPo5U8]Ladies Come First Female Face Tatts and Warpaints[/url]
- [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zPaJao9xzEw]Elysium Estate - Breezehome Alternative [/url]

More coming soon!
